label: Get to Know Me!
description: Hi, I'm a recent graduate from Häme University of Applied Sciences (HAMK) and currently working at Calevala. I have a passion for creating responsive and scalable web applications, and I’m dedicated to staying up-to-date with the latest technologies. My goal is to craft seamless user experiences that are both efficient and visually appealing. I’m always eager to learn, push the boundaries of what’s possible, and bring innovative ideas to life!
